posts.title: Today was a strange day
posts.author: Lenny Peters
posts.content: It started raining for no reason.

posts.title: Why don't they make bacon?
posts.author: Lenny Peters
posts.content: Shocked how many times I don't see omelette's with bacon on the menu.

comments.author: Lenny Peters
comments.content: This is the best blog post ever!
